snippet.title: Endlanders  - Kickstarter Trailer (Live now!)
snippet.description:
Support our Kickstarter campaign!

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/endlanders/endlanders

Build your deck, glitch through enemies, translate unknown languages and decipher the mysteries of this universe, in this grid-based real time combat indie game. Endlanders : First Encounter features two main characters with diverging storylines in the same universe, fighting their way through unknown planes.

Endlanders : First Encounter features only the first playable character, and serves as a prologue for the full game.

Our prologue is now available on steam :

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2010450/Endlanders__First_Encounter/?l=english

Wishlist the full game here :

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1905960/Endlanders/

Follow us on our social media :

https://twitter.com/StudiosEteros

Join our discord server :

http://discord.gg/zCrzwGMTdt
